Text: RE Hellopst Setting up oil n products options book Nice peoplealot of ex enron It feels very much like enron used to be b we grew out of control But there is a guy here with equally bad shirt taste as Marcello Seems a shame mark wright and a few others went to williams and that isnt lookin too rosie I actually found out about enrons demise when i was away in honeymoon great wedding present but still sounds like the best place to be considering everyone else was in the pub Will the UBS job b in Houston back in london Well keep in touch and if ur in london and fancy a beer let me know take care Jonesy Original Message From SMTP Sent February To Subject RE Hello Hello Glad you got yourself sorted with a new job Things here are getting better we have nearly closed with UBS so I hope to have a new job next week Still in Houston Are you trading if so what Take care Louise Original Message From ENRON Sent Tuesday January AM To Kitchen Louise Subject Hello Louise How r u doing Are you still in Houston Just a quick note to say hello really Good luck Jonesy Erleben Sie die neue RWE OnlineWelt unter This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you
